title: 0 rp at level 10?
body:
Hello everybdy,
My understanding is that you get 400rp points when you hit level 10 however this isnt the case for me. Am I misguided? All help is appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey there,

The old RP reward was replaced with a free hextech chest at level 3 (?) when the hextech crafting system was implemented.

oh ok thanks 

rip free skins from smurf
